  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DisplayRemote, DisplayView

    public interface Display
    Author:
    Divine Threepwood

    • Method Detail

      • showURL

        Future<Void> showURL(String url)
              throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException
        Shows the given URL on the generic display. Display will set to foreground if the panel is hided.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL to display
        Returns:
        the future which represents the execution process.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException - is thrown if the execution could not be performed.on

      • showHTMLContent

        Future<Void> showHTMLContent(String content)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • setVisible

        Future<Void> setVisible(Boolean visible)
                 throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException
        Displays the server in foreground fullscreen mode or hides the overall window.
        Parameters:
        visible - this flag defines the visibility. True means the display will be set visible and false hides the display.
        Returns:
        the future which gives feedback about the asynchronous execution process.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException - is thrown if the execution could not be performed.
